org.kurento.repository

Class RepositoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kurento.repository.RepositoryService

  • public class RepositoryService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service component that exposes a simpler Java API for the Kurento Repository.

    • Method Detail

      • createRepositoryItem

        public RepositoryItemRecorder createRepositoryItem(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Creates a new repository item with the provided metadata and its associated recorder endpoint.
        Parameters:
        metadata - key-value pairs, can be null
        Returns:
        a RepositoryItemRecorder containing the item's id and the recorder URL

      • removeRepositoryItem

        public void removeRepositoryItem(java.lang.String itemId)
                          throws ItemNotFoundException
        Removes the repository item associated to the provided id.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the id of an existing repository item
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - if the object is not found

      • getReadEndpoint

        public RepositoryItemPlayer getReadEndpoint(java.lang.String itemId)
                                     throws ItemNotFoundException
        Obtains a new endpoint for reading (playing multimedia) from the repository item.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the id of an existing repository item
        Returns:
        the URL of the reading endpoint
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - if the object is not found

      • findItems

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> findItems(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata,
                                        boolean regex)
        Searches for repository items by each pair of attributes and their values. The values can be regular expressions (use the flag, Luke).
        Parameters:
        metadata - pairs of attributes and their values (can be regexes)
        regex - if true, will activate search by attribute regex
        Returns:
        a Set<String> with identifiers of the repository items that were found

      • getRepositoryItemMetadata

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getRepositoryItemMetadata(java.lang.String itemId)
                                                                           throws ItemNotFoundException
        Returns the metadata from a repository item.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the id of an existing repository item
        Returns:
        the metadata map
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - if the object is not found

      • setRepositoryItemMetadata

        public void setRepositoryItemMetadata(java.lang.String itemId,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
                               throws ItemNotFoundException
        Replaces the metadata of a repository item.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the id of an existing repository item
        metadata - the new metadata
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - if the object is not found
